column11: Charles Marie de la Condamine went to South America on a trip. There
column12: he found two different trees containing latex: Hevea brasiliensis and Castilla elastica
column13: but only the first became important as a natural rubber source. The reason why the Hevea tree succeeded over the Castilla tree was the way its latex was transported along the trunk.
